This game might be good if it wasn't riddled with bugs that make it difficult to even start the game. Gotta open up the steam overlay before I press start or it thinks I'm offline, had to reinstall it twice because it gave me fragmented or broken files and then threatened to ban me for tampering with the files somehow that I JUST downloaded. Framerate caps at 30 fps and goes down to 15 fps if you don't go into the %appdata% and specifically type your own max framerate in the game config, which makes it look at first glance like the game is unplayable. It makes it look like your video card just can't run the game.

The gameplays alright, but have fun getting reported every match if you're a killer.

Great game.Every 2nd game is survive with friends. First couple game is always good because you play against people who can't do gens. Once you get a little higher rank, it doesn't matter if you play well or not. Down a person in 30 seconds is irrelevant because the other 3 people will sit on gens and game is over in 6 minute anyway. Don't have slow down perk? Game is over in 6 minute. This game is so unbalanced, tournament player all carry noed, because there is no way to finish the game against player who just sit on gens. I recommend this game to anyone who want to regret their life choice when they are 70. On the other hand, great game to play if you want to play repair simulator. Survivors perk are overpowered. Got rescued, killer can't down you for 15 seconds. On top of that, if you have decisive strike, you are pretty much immune since they can't hook you for 60 seconds. 
If you are playing with friends, just carry object of obsession, it allow you tell your friends exactly where the killer is at all time! 
Don't worry, devs are working on balance changes though. They are constantly working on nerfing killer' perks, and make survivor win more.
Chances are you won't be having fun without lots of grinding or spending extra $ on it. I have 100 hours on killer only, and I barely got 1 slow down perks on 1 killer. All the good perks require grinding+$. 

Remember, refund is an option within 2 hour gameplay.

A game that can feel very imbalanced when you first start playing, but seriously, having an asymmetrical game feel as good as this for killer and survivor is an achievement of its own. 

Sound design is amazing, I still just hum the menu music to myself. 
Gameplay is great, but taking long breaks can leave you at a huge disadvantage against some of the new killers.

Um jogo maravilhoso que reúne tantos assassinos clássicos do terror como criações próprias da desenvolvedora, é envolvente e competitivo te fazendo querer ser cada vez melhor e te prendendo por horas a fio de jogatina. Recomendo para todos os fãs de terror que buscam sentir na pele o que a tentativa de fugir de um assassino, assim como estar na pele dele e encontrar as suas presas.

Dead by daylight ou DBD para os mais íntimos é um jogo que consegue ganhar um espaço no seu coração. Como main survivor, posso dizer que o rage vem em muitos momentos, mas faz parte de qualquer jogo, DBD mesmo com partidas frustrantes fala mais forte e toca o seu coração de um maneira única, é o jogo de todos, para todos.

YES

This is probably one of the best games I've played in a while...

The controls are smooth; it's easy to manipulate through the mazes and obstacles that are in your way. And it takes skill. I appreciate the flashlight players.... they mean to get in the facts of killers! ^_^ 

Survivors are a good set up too.... In fact whether or not you play killer or survivor, if you pay attention, you can manipulate the map to your advantage. As you learn to get used to your surroundings,you grow better as a player. 

And the Ranking system in the game is far; you're rewarded for being a good play and being a part of the team so everyone benefits. 
Cahraters are well thought out for the base game, and even more detail added to DLC's to keep you entertained about wanting to learn more of the plot, and their take on some of the more iconic characters.

Sehr Sehr Tolles Spiel! Trotz den vielen Bugs wird man sehr viel Spaß darin finden. Alleine macht es Natürlich auch Spaß aber am besten ist es mit seinen Freunden dieses Spiel zu spielen. Hier ist es ähnlich wie bei CS:GO. Das Spiel macht Spaß in Schüben/Phasen und man wird sehr sehr Süchtig. Wenn man Allgemein Horror mag bzw. Horror Charakter wird hier auch aufjedenfall seinen Gefallen finden. Eines der besten Top 5 Spiele auf Steam!
